narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "A"  breeders license.  
The application and license fee should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the owner.
